panels.description: This will provide the KPI report for the selected KPIs for the selected duration, aggregated at per day.

matcher.options: LTE_5750a E-UTRAN Cell Availability Ratio pm_data_source.dn.keyword
LTE_5750a E-UTRAN Cell Availability Ratio {{ term pm_data_source.dn}}
LTE_5750a E-UTRAN Cell Availability Ratio {{ term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}
LTE_5750a E-UTRAN Cell Availability Ratio NE-MRBTS-182292/NE-LNBTS-182292/LNCEL-2
LTE_5750a E-UTRAN Cell Availability Ratio undefined 1
LTE_5750a E-UTRAN Cell Availability Ratio PLMN-PLMN/MRBTS-1022/LNBTS-1022/LNCEL-0
LTE_5750a E-UTRAN Cell Availability Ratio PLMN-PLMN/MRBTS-1002/LNBTS-1002/LNCEL-0

targets.alias: LTE_5750a E-UTRAN Cell Availability Ratio {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.avc3 == null) { return null }  else if (params.M8020C6 == 0) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.M8020C3/params.M8020C6) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Avail_M8020C3:*

targets.alias: M8051C58 - E-UTRAN LTE_UE_Quantity {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.av_58 == null) { return null } else { return params.C58 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_UE_Quantity_M8051C58:*

targets.alias: LTE_6160b Total E-UTRAN RRC Connection Setup Attempts {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.AV_C17 == null) { return null } else { return (params.M8013C17 + params.M8013C18 +params.M8013C19 +params.M8013C34 +params.M8013C31 +params.M8013C21 +params.M8013C93 +params.M8013C91) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_UE_State_M8013C17:*

targets.alias: LTE_5118a E-UTRAN E-RAB Setup Attempts {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.av_6c0 == null) { return null } else { return params.c0 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_EPS_Bearer_M8006C0:*

targets.alias: LTE_5143a Total E-UTRAN RRC Connection Re-establishment Success Ratio {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.av_c5 == null) { return null } else if (params.c4 == 0){ return 0 } else { return 100*(params.c5/params.c4) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_RRC_M8008C5:*

targets.alias: LTE_5116a E-UTRAN Data Radio Bearer Attempts {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.av_c0 == null) { return null } else { return params.c0 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Radio_Bearer_M8007C0:*

targets.alias: LTE 5242b E-Utran Average RRC Connected UEs {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.AV_60 == null) { return null }  else if (params.M8051C61 == 0) { return 0 } else { return (params.M8051C60/params.M8051C61) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_UE_Quantity_M8051C61:*

targets.alias: LTE 5212a E-Utran PDCP SDU Volume DL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.AV_C20 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8012C20/1000000) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C20:*

targets.alias: Total volume LTE 5212a E-Utran PDCP SDU Volume DL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.AV_C20 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8012C20/1000000) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C20:*

targets.alias: LTE 5213a E-Utran PDCP SDU Volume UL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.AV_C19 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8012C19/1000000) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C19:*

targets.alias: Total volume LTE 5213a E-Utran PDCP SDU Volume UL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.AV_C19 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8012C19/1000000) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C19:*

targets.alias: Average PDCP Layer Throughput UL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}
targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C23:*

targets.alias: Total Avg PDCP Datarate UL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}
targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C23:*

targets.alias: Average PDCP Layer Throughput DL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}
targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C26:*

targets.alias: Total Avg PDCP Datarate DL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}
targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C26:*

targets.alias: LTE 6159a E-Utran RACH Setup Attempts {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.AV_C6 == null) { return null }  else { return (params.M8001C6 + params.M8001C7 + params.M8001C286) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Load_M8001C6:*

targets.alias: LTE 5218g Total E-UTRAN RRC Connection Setup Success Ratio {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.AV_C5 == null) { return null } else if ( (params.M8013C17 + params.M8013C18 +params.M8013C19 +params.M8013C34 +params.M8013C31 +params.M8013C21 +params.M8013C93 +params.M8013C91) == 0) { return 0 } else { return 100 * ((params.M8013C5)/(params.M8013C17 + params.M8013C18 +params.M8013C19 +params.M8013C34 +params.M8013C31 +params.M8013C21 +params.M8013C93 +params.M8013C91)) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_UE_State_M8013C5:*

targets.alias: LTE_5025i E-UTRAN E-RAB Drop Ratio, RAN View {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if (params.AV_C261 == null) { return null }  else if ((params.M8006C254 + params.M8006C261 + params.M8006C6 + params.M8006C7 + params.M8006C8 + params.M8006C9 + params.M8006C277 - params.M8006C301 + params.M8006C303 + params.M8006C306 + params.M8006C309 + params.M8006C310 + params.M8006C311 + params.M8006C312 + params.M8006C313) == 0) { return 0 } else { return 100*((params.M8006C261 + params.M8006C254 - params.M8006C255 - params.M8006C258 - params.M8006C341 - params.M8006C301 + params.M8006C309 + params.M8006C311 + params.M8006C313)/(params.M8006C254 + params.M8006C261 + params.M8006C6 + params.M8006C7 + params.M8006C8 + params.M8006C9 + params.M8006C277 - params.M8006C301 + params.M8006C303 + params.M8006C306 + params.M8006C309 + params.M8006C310 + params.M8006C311 + params.M8006C312 + params.M8006C313)) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_EPS_Bearer_M8006C261:*

targets.alias: LTE_5017a E-UTRAN E-RAB Setup Success Ratio {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C0 == null ) { return null } else if ( params.M8006C0 == 0 ) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.M8006C1/params.M8006C0) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_EPS_Bearer_M8006C0:*

targets.alias: LTE_6161a RRC Connection Re-establishment Attempts per type total attempts {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C4 == null ) { return null } else { return params.M8008C4}

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_RRC_M8008C4:*

targets.alias: LTE_5276b E-UTRAN average PRB usage per TTI DL / E-UTRAN Avg PRB usage per TTI DL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C37 == null ) { return null } else { return params.M8011C37/10 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Resource_M8011C37:*

targets.alias: LTE_5273b E-UTRAN Average PRB usage per TTI UL {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C24 == null ) { return null } else { return params.M8011C24/10 }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Resource_M8011C24:*

targets.alias: LTE_1492b Estimated DL averaged UE throughput {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C20 == null ) { return null } else if ( params.M8051C101 == 0 ) { return 0 } else { return 8*(params.M8012C20/params.M8051C101) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C20:*

targets.alias: LTE_1493b Estimated UL averaged UE throughput {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_C19 == null ) { return null } else if ( params.M8051C99 == 0 ) { return 0 } else { return 8*(params.M8012C19/params.M8051C99) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Cell_Throughput_M8012C19:*

targets.alias: LTE_5427b E-UTRAN Average CQI {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if ((params.c36 + params.c116 + params.c37 + params.c117 + params.c38 + params.c118 + params.c39 + params.c119 + params.c40 + params.c120 + params.c41 + params.c121 + params.c42 + params.c122 + params.c43 + params.c123 + params.c44 + params.c124 + params.c45 + params.c125 + params.c46 + params.c126 + params.c47 + params.c127 + params.c48 + params.c128 + params.c49 + params.c129 + params.c50 + params.c130 + params.c51 + params.c131) == 0) { return 0 } else { return (1*(params.c37 + params.c117) + 2*(params.c38 + params.c118) + 3*(params.c39 + params.c119) + 4*(params.c40 + params.c120) + 5*(params.c41 + params.c121) + 6*(params.c42 + params.c122) + 7*(params.c43 + params.c123) + 8*(params.c44 + params.c124) + 9*(params.c45 + params.c125) + 10*(params.c46 + params.c126) + 11*(params.c47 + params.c127) + 12*(params.c48 + params.c128) + 13*(params.c49 + params.c129) + 14*(params.c50 + params.c130) + 15*(params.c51 + params.c131))/(params.c36 + params.c116 + params.c37 + params.c117 + params.c38 + params.c118 + params.c39 + params.c119 + params.c40 + params.c120 + params.c41 + params.c121 + params.c42 + params.c122 + params.c43 + params.c123 + params.c44 + params.c124 + params.c45 + params.c125 + params.c46 + params.c126 + params.c47 + params.c127 + params.c48 + params.c128 + params.c49 + params.c129 + params.c50 + params.c130 + params.c51 + params.c131) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Pwr_and_Qual_DL_M8010C36:*

targets.alias: LTE_493b % of UL PUSCH Bad Received Signal Strength Indicator Level {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if ((params.c28 + params.c29 + params.c30 + params.c31 + params.c32 + params.c33 + params.c34 + params.c35 + params.c36 + params.c37 + params.c38 + params.c39 + params.c40 + params.c41 + params.c42 + params.c43 + params.c44 + params.c45 + params.c46 + params.c47 + params.c48 + params.c49) == 0){ return 0 } else { return 100*(params.c28 + params.c29 + params.c30 + params.c31 + params.c32 + params.c33 + params.c34 + params.c35)/ (params.c28 + params.c29 + params.c30 + params.c31 + params.c32 + params.c33 + params.c34 + params.c35 + params.c36 + params.c37 + params.c38 + params.c39 + params.c40 + params.c41 + params.c42 + params.c43 + params.c44 + params.c45 + params.c46 + params.c47 + params.c48 + params.c49) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Pwr_and_Qual_UL_M8005C29:*

settings.script: if ( params.Avg_c2 == null ) { return null } else if ( params.M8021C0 == 0 ) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.M8021C2/params.M8021C0) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND pm_data.LTE_Handover_M8021C2:*

targets.alias: LTE_5568a E-UTRAN Intra-Frequency HO Success Ratio {{term pm_data_source.dn.keyword}}

settings.script: if ( (params.M8009C6 + params.M8014C6 + params.M8014C18 - params.M8021C0) == 0 ) { return 0 } else { return 100*(params.M8009C7 + params.M8014C7 + params.M8014C19 - params.M8021C2)/(params.M8009C6 + params.M8014C6 +params.M8014C18 - params.M8021C0) }

targets.query: pm_data_source.nhg_alias:$nhgname AND pm_data_source.dn:$ap_id AND pm_data_source.dn:*LNCEL* AND (pm_data.LTE_Intra_eNB_HO_M8009C7:* OR pm_data.LTE_Inter_eNB_HO_M8014C7:* OR pm_data.LTE_Handover_M8021C2:*)

panels.title: LTE KPI Report - Name

list.description: The interval is used to aggregate the metrics over time.
list.label: Aggregation
list.name: agg
